title: The Victorian flower garden
brief_description: The highly praised BBC television series, recreating horticultural history to demonstrate how Victorian gardens were created. In this program, host Harry Dodson explains the duty of the head gardener and grows a range of different plants, including some that are hard to find in this day and age.
